species.name: polteageist
descriptions: Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.
This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
